open_risks: Weekend/off-hours geopolitical or trade-policy headline causes a gap move (risk premia widen; gold up; ES/NQ down) with limited liquidity to absorb it.
Earnings-driven factor rotation: AI/mega-cap guidance triggers sharp NQ vs ES divergence; index-level move dominated by a few prints.
Fed communication reprices the real-rate path (hawkish hold): duration shock that compresses equity multiples and pressures gold if real yields rise (or lifts gold if risk-off dominates).
US fiscal/shutdown risk returns: partial funding bill reduces near-term risk, but the next deadline can reintroduce policy uncertainty quickly.
